sentences.sContent: The president announced Monday that he would cancel the debt.
sentences.sCn: 总统周一宣布他会取消这笔债务。

sentences.sContent: ...But scientists released a report Monday documenting with hard evidence the discovery of lost lions...
...so can I fly out early Monday morning...
...Your first meeting is on Monday the 21st at 9am...
...there’s a class that meets on Monday evenings at 7...

phrases.pCn: 黑色的星期一（指股市大跌经常出现在星期一的现象）；复活节后的星期一

trans.tranOther: the day between Sunday and Tuesday
